title: Microsoft support for Win 7 PRO
content:
Hello! 

 This is not really a question ... more a comment.  This morning when I opened my WIN 7 HOME tower PC, and

opened FIREFOX, I saw the notice that this latest release is the latest for WIN 7. That's fine, but I wish to tell you something about WIN 7 PRO & MICROSOFT. 

 Evidently, there is some major user of WIN 7 PRO who has demanded that MICROSOFT continue to support this version.  I have two H-P laptops, which I use for Ladder programming. Both are loaded with WIN 7 PRO,

and both receive periodic updates from MICROSOFT. So, it would seem that ALL support for these older releases of Windows has not ended. 

 I am in the process of moving all my files & applications from this WIN 7 HOME PC to my WIN 10 tower PC.

THANK YOU. robert herold 17mkombi@gmail.com OR rhh.jr5387@gmail.com

P.S. Had no problem porting the FIREFOX data to the 10, but had a lot of problems doing the same for THUNDERBIRD on this PC to the 10, despite getting assistance from your tech people.
creator: KARL_TAUSCHEN

title: Youtube Basic Buttons not appearing
content: Buttons like 3 bar preferences button, notification etc are broken or not visible just the highlight is visible and click the notification button also break the whole browser
creator: shahin1465686

title: záložky zmizely
content: Dobrý den, potém co jsem odinstaloval a znovu nainstaloval Firefox, se mi po přihlášení do profilu neobjevují záložky a také nejsou v paměti hesla. Mám na Desktop složku Původní data aplikace Firefox- lze to nějak obnovit pomocí této složky? Nebo jinak? Děkuji. (Windows 10)
creator: zaluzie.doubek

title: Errore	Firefox Default Browser Agent	2	Nessuna
content: Tutti i giorni alla solita ora trovo nel visualizzatore eventi il seguente errore: Errore Firefox Default Browser Agent id 2
creator: qpvfrob

title: Multi-container is not properly holding my account
content:
It seems that every time I open youtube(I do have 2 different youtube accounts for 2 different containers) it asks to confirm to open in which container it needs to be opened even after checking the remember check box.

And also every time, I need to login to my account once I restarted my fire fox browser. It would have been better if the first container always holds and remember my account for that container
creator: 22murugeshbabu

title: Javascript is enabled, but is not functional.
content:
Hi - Javzscript Enable, though "True", still brings up the error "Enable Javascript". I spent hours on this, but nothing useful was found. Has any one had this problem, and if so, were they able to fix it?

Best regards, Nick.
creator: mr.nick

title: Opt-out language sync
content: I have two profiles on one computer and I want to use these profiles in different languages for web pages (one in English and one in my native language). If I sign-in the two profiles using one common Firefox account, this seems to be impossible: a change of the language setting in one profile immediately reflects into the other profile. Is there a way to disable the sync of language? I want histories and bookmarks to be synced across the profiles and thus I want to use the same account. Thank you.
creator: kazuma.tateiri16

title: I want my bookmark tab above other tabs
content:
I have always had my bookmark tab above/over my working tabs. but it is no longer there.

Uncle Dewey
creator: uncledewey

title: Password autofill keeps turning off
content: I keep having to turn password autofill on every time I start Firefox. I don't know why but for some reason it keeps turning itself off every time I close Firefox. This is extremely frustrating, please help
creator: galentheaviator
